body_html:
Hello, I am a newbie and would like to tackle this issue. Is the intended behavior to throw an error when the types don't match?

====== EDIT =======

Actually, I see that the example above fails if both arguments aren't the same type. I'm guessing this got fixed somewhere along the way. Would be great if someone can confirm.

body:
Hello, I am a newbie and would like to tackle this issue. Is the intended behavior to throw an error when the types don't match? 

====== EDIT =======

Actually, I see that the example above fails if both arguments aren't the same type. I'm guessing this got fixed somewhere along the way. Would be great if someone can confirm.
